article.Heading: India Economic Survey 2017: Here are 8 interesting facts about India
article.Summary: This year, the Economic Survey 2016-17 includes a special section, "Eight Interesting Facts About India", which demystifies many interesting facts about our country that often go unnoticed.
article.Body:
Moneycontrol Bureau

Here is a look at the Economic Survey 2016-17's special section, "Eight Interesting Facts About India", which explains many interesting facts about our country that often go unnoticed.
